added: Spotify to Mediaserver; A new worker that converts your playlists to audio and video playlists

Music Video; A new system which can download music videos from Youtube (check legal issues)
Debug logs, creating a file named DEBUG in the /data directory will enable debug logging
changed: Repo transferred to a different user
Fixed; Config file not saving correctly
Using a store for the webui

added: SwipeArr; Tv shows now display total episode and season count

added: DynaArr; Checks if Arr instances are busy searching
changed: Fixed; UI SwipeArr for devices with not enough height
Fixed; API endpoints for Emby and Jellyfin
Fixed; Media server info not saving

added: SwipeArr; A Tinder like interface to manage your libraries
DynaArr; An automated management system for Arr suite
Tool - Delete unmonitored; Delete all unmonitored files
